other_title: デジモンクロスウォーズ (Japanese)
plot: Taiki Kudō, an upbeat seventh-grade boy who always helps people in need, encounters a Digimon named Shoutmon, who brings him and his friends to the Digital World. With his friends Akari Hinomoto and Zenjirō Tsurugi, they form Team Xros Heart to compete against rival teams battling for supremacy, with their ultimate goal of taking down the evil Bagura Empire, who plans to conquer the Digital World.
opening_theme: "Act as One (Digimon Fusion Theme)" by Noam Kaniel and Frederic Jaffre
"Never Give Up!" (ネバギバ！) by Sonar Pocket (eps 1-)
ending_theme: "The 3 of Us" by Fusion United Team (eps 31-53)
insert_song: "Evolution & DigiXros KIRIHA VER." by Tanimoto Takayoshi (Ep 32)
"Evolution & DigiXros TAIKI VER." by Wada Kouji (Ep 31)
"Sora Mau Yūsha! X5" by Wada Kouji (Ep 17)
"We are Xros Heart" by Kouji Wada
"We Are Xross Heart Ver. X7" by Wada Kouji, Tanimoto Takayoshi & Miyazaki Ayumi
